Details: Halem - At upstream ofTinikuniaon R/Bank TeaGardenBundof R Brahmajan | Tinikunia | Sharp current of flood water eroded away the Tea garden bund for a length of 210m and breached it at upstream of Tinikunia for a length of 4.5m on R/Bank of river Brahmajan near Joregaon area.
